channel.title: VPS or a VPN for a RAT?
channel.description: I only have one RAT license and I was wondering if a VPS would be the best viable option to interact with my RAT. I was thinking of getting a VPN and then buying a VPS and only connecting with that VPN. Does anyone suggest anything better or is this alright?
